N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 576.6 - Special procedures applicable to certain variance applications

State Regulations
(a) When the deputy
director-regulatory programs believes that grounds for the variance clearly
exist, the notice of hearing shall state that he intends to recommend to the
agency that the variance be granted and shall state any conditions which he
recommends be imposed. (b) An
agency staff member will appear at the hearing solely to receive objections to
the granting of the variance. If significant issues are raised, an adjournment
will be taken and another hearing will be scheduled. Notes
